snippet: Ron Washington said that if Game 7 presented the Rangers with a save situation, he would call on Neftali Feliz, as usual.
lead_paragraph: Ron Washington said that if Game 7 presented the Rangers with a save situation, he would call on Neftali Feliz, as usual.

headline.main: Texas Manager Stands By the Closer Who Let It Slip Away
headline.print_headline: Texas Manager Stands By the Closer Who Let It Slip Away
headline.seo: World Series: Rangers’ Washington Stands By Closer Feliz After Game 6 Heartbreak
